page.title: 20Gloucester Housewife's Day
page.content: {Housewife and mother of 5,}my day begins at 7.30.After breakfast my husband leaves for work,the children for school,Christopher 15 to Sir Thomas Rich's,Amanda 13 to Denmark Road,Catherine 11,Nicholas 5 to Kingsholm,Andrew 3 doesn't attend school.I take Nicholas to school then home to start housework.Andrew and I lunch at 1.15,the children staying for school dinners.Afternoon I may do some gardening or shopping.At 3.15 time to collect Nicholas.Sometimes we go to the Library then home.After tea I like to listen to Nicholas reading,I get the boys ready for bed at 7.30 and read their bedtime story.Feet up and coffee time at about 8, bliss!After if I dont have a meeting or skittle match to attend I like to go to a pub for a drink with my husband watch TV.or read,to bed 11.30.Another busy day.
